items.sentence: I thought it over and decided to tell Tom everything.
If it sounds too good to be true, it probably isn\'t.
If there\'s anything else you need, just let me know.
If they were Canadians, this problem wouldn\'t exist.
If you can\'t come, please let me know ahead of time.
Tom became aware that he was no longer alone anymore.
Tom bet Mary that he could beat her at arm wrestling.
Tom bought this camera for himself, not for his wife.
Tom came into the living room, not wearing any pants.
Tom came to Boston in 2001 and lived here until 2010.
Tom can speak French almost as well as you and I can.
Tom and Mary have been married for over thirty years.
Tom came a little earlier today than he usually does.
I suppose that\'s one of the reasons Tom isn\'t here.
Tom just didn\'t want to admit that he\'d been wrong.
I have no interest whatsoever in eating English food.
I know that the last thing you want to do is help me.
Tom is the only one who would do something like that.
Tom is the owner of the biggest ranch in these parts.
Tom can\'t remember his kindergarten teacher\'s name.
